import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Convert data to Excel file"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/files/convert-to-excel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Converts a JSON data structure into an Excel (.xlsx) file and returns a temporary download URL. Use this to generate Excel exports from structured data without client-side Excel libraries.

**Workflow Example**
1. Prepare column definitions with headers and data types
2. Prepare row data as arrays matching the column structure
3. POST the data structure to this endpoint
4. Receive a temporary download URL in the response
5. Download the Excel file using [GET /api/v1.0/files/excel/\{FileId\}](/docs/api/files/get-excel-file)

**Request Structure**:
- `Columns`: Array of column definitions with Name, DisplayName, and optional formatting
- `Rows`: Array of row arrays containing cell values matching column order

**Use Cases**:
- Exporting search results to Excel
- Generating custom reports
- Creating data exports for offline analysis

**Notes**: The generated file URL is temporary and expires after a period. Download promptly or store the file permanently using the standard upload endpoints.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Title":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Report title"},"SubTitle":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Report subtitle"},"FileName":{"type":"string","description":"Target file name"},"Columns":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Caption":{"type":"string","description":"Column header text"}},"title":"ExcelConversionRequestColumn"}},"Rows":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","nullable":true}}},"title":"ExcelConversionRequestRow"}},"JobId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"NotifyUser":{"type":"boolean","default":false}},"title":"ExcelConversionRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Conversion successful, URL returned","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["Item","StatusCode"],"properties":{"Item":{"type":"string","description":"URL to the converted Excel file"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"ExcelConversionUrlResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
